tasks.question: Identify each event
tasks.guidance: Alongside the main event, the playbills often contain details of additional events occurring on the same date. A rectangle should be drawn around the full details of each. Any notes about upcoming or past events can be ignored.

tasks.question: Identify each title
tasks.guidance: Draw a rectangle around the title of each event. Any notes about upcoming or past events can be ignored.

tasks.question: Identify each person
tasks.guidance: Draw a rectangle around each person (encapsulating any assoicated details, such as their position or role).

tasks.question: Identify each date
tasks.guidance: Draw a rectangle around each date. Any notes about upcoming or past events can be ignored.

tasks.question: Identify each title
tasks.guidance: Draw a rectangle around the title of each event. Any notes about upcoming or past events can be ignored.

tasks.question: Identify each person
tasks.guidance: Draw a rectangle around each person (encapsulating any assoicated details, such as their position or role).

tasks.question: Identify each date
tasks.guidance: Draw a rectangle around the date of each event. Any notes about upcoming or past events can be ignored.

tasks.question: Identify each subject
tasks.guidance: Draw a rectangle around each subject or genre. Any notes about upcoming or past events can be ignored.
